revised_title: Investigation of the Viscosity and Composition of Liquid Sulphur
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to measure the viscosity of liquid sulphur at various temperatures and studied its relationship with the composition of the sample. They found that the viscosity of sulphur is highly sensitive to temperature changes and that the physical properties of sulphur provide a more accurate method of detecting changes than other properties such as density, coefficient of expansion, or surface tension.
